backend/main.mo: Defines actor with types and CRUD state maps for jobs, candidates, interviews, clients, and user profiles, including access control and profile APIs.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing optional-select sentinel changes and related frontend files for two features.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-like document summarizing various frontend files for routing, forms, utilities, and styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry template loading the React app with favicon and root container.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main router setup configuring authentication gates, profile checks, and route definitions for all pages.
frontend/src/components/AccessDeniedScre: Simple UI screen showing an access denied message with navigation back to dashboard.
frontend/src/components/AppHeader.tsx: Header displaying branding, user profile menu, role info, and logout handling.
frontend/src/components/AppLayout.tsx: Page layout wrapper with header, sidebar, main content region, and footer.
frontend/src/components/AppSidebar.tsx: Sidebar navigation listing main app sections with active state highlighting.
frontend/src/components/AuthGate.tsx: Wrapper component enforcing authentication and loading states before rendering children.
frontend/src/components/EmptyState.tsx: Reusable empty-state component with optional illustration, text, and action button.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupDial: A dialog component that collects name and email, then saves the user profile via a mutation.
frontend/src/hooks/queryKeys.ts: Defines structured React Query keys for user, jobs, candidates, interviews, and clients.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor tied to Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and hooks for Internet Identity authentication, loading, login, and logout.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, roles, admin status, jobs, candidates, interviews, and clients.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles plus custom CSS variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point setting up React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/candidates/CandidateC: Form page for creating a new candidate, validating inputs and submitting to the createCandidate API before navigating to the detail page.
frontend/src/pages/candidates/CandidateD: Displays detailed candidate information, related job opening data, and status badges, with navigation to edit.
frontend/src/pages/candidates/CandidateE: Loads an existing candidate into an editable form, validates updates, and submits changes to updateCandidate.
frontend/src/pages/candidates/Candidates: Lists all candidates with search, status filtering, and delete actions, providing navigation to create or view candidates.
frontend/src/pages/clients/ClientCreateP: Form page for creating a new client with required fields validated before submitting to createClient.
frontend/src/pages/clients/ClientDetailP: Displays detailed client information, including status, notes, and contact details, with navigation and edit actions.
frontend/src/pages/clients/ClientEditPag: Provides a form to edit an existing client's data with validation and submission to update the record.
frontend/src/pages/clients/ClientsListPa: Shows a searchable, filterable list of clients with options to view, edit, or delete entries.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Dashboard showing stats for jobs, candidates, interviews, and clients with navigation shortcuts.
frontend/src/pages/interviews/InterviewC: Form for scheduling a new interview, collecting candidate, job, date, time, type, and location data.
frontend/src/pages/interviews/InterviewD: Displays interview details with status, candidate/job info, outcome notes, and a link to edit the interview.
frontend/src/pages/interviews/InterviewE: Form page for editing an interview, loading existing data, validating inputs, and submitting updates via mutation.
frontend/src/pages/interviews/Interviews: Lists all interviews with status filtering, candidate lookup, and deletion support through a confirmation dialog.
frontend/src/pages/jobs/JobCreatePage.ts: Form page for creating a new job opening with client selection, validation, and submission to the API.
frontend/src/pages/jobs/JobDetailPage.ts: Displays detailed information about a job opening, including client info, status badge, and navigation to edit.
frontend/src/pages/jobs/JobEditPage.tsx: Form page for editing an existing job opening, preloading data, validating fields, and submitting updates.
frontend/src/pages/jobs/JobsListPage.tsx: React page showing a searchable, filterable list of job openings with status badges and delete confirmation.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Login page using Internet Identity with a styled UI and loading state.
frontend/src/utils/optionalSelect.ts: Provides a sentinel value and mapping helpers to handle optional shadcn-ui Select fields.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading URL params, persisting them in sessionStorage, and cleaning hash parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, animations, and layout settings with plugins enabled.
project_state.json: Project state metadata describing features, issues, and requirements for the hospitality management app.
